channel.title: Can someone with a mac who has a server
channel.description:
please help me fix my compiler for my server. i have a mac, adn this is what i have: ok so i switched my compiler to compiler.term, and this is what's inside: [code] @echo off title ZymusScape Compiler /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/javac.exec -cp . *.java /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/java.exe server pause[/code] and when i run it i get this error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bot [Process exited - exit code 1]
and this is the command i use: [code] java -cp MoparScape32.jar; Bot[/code] m real not sure if what i have in the compiler, like the pause and @ echo are supposed to be there. please help ~Zyle1992~ [br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 08:02:10 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE SOMEONE HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

dude no affence but no1 uses mac

item.title: Can someone with a mac who has a server
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

@echo off
title ZymusScape Compiler

that is suposed to be in a batch file, the title part isnt needed, but the @echo off makes it so it doesnt echo everything it does, so thats good, but idk nething about macs so sorry i cant help

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone with a mac who has a server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

please help me fix my compiler for my server. i have a mac, adn this is what i have:

ok so i switched my compiler to compiler.term, and this is whatâ€™s inside:

@echo off title ZymusScape Compiler /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/javac.exec -cp . *.java /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/java.exe server pause

and when i run it i get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bot [Process exited - exit code 1]

and this is the command i use:

java -cp MoparScape32.jar; Bot

m real not sure if what i have in the compiler, like the pause and @ echo are supposed to be there. please help

~Zyle1992~
